issues.businessImpact: 60% of restaurant orders come from mobile - this is costing you sales

opportunities: Competitors rank higher for delivery keywords

recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza delivery near me", "pizza restaurant near me" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords
Ranking below #1 for 6 keywords - increase customer reviews and engagement to improve rankings

reviews.text: Visited on 7/6/2025. Order #144. 1 large regular meaty special pizza for $32.25. Told server lightly brown soft crust. Not hard and crunchy. She asked about the slicing and I chose the standard 8 slice versus the square 16 sliced. Pizza came out 16 sliced and the crust edges and bottom were hard and crunchy. You couldn't even cut it with the knife they gave you. Horrible pizza. Had a similar issue 2 years ago also. Burned black crust. Wouldn't fix or do anything about it. Time before was in 2012 and back then their pizza was the best. Not now. I'll go elsewhere. Especially at that price.

I am bias cuz I have had Pepi‚Äôs for about 40 years.. since o was a kid.. there pizza, fried dough, wings and even salad are great.. they have gone up in price so I can‚Äôt get it all the time but they do offer deals so it helps.. but it‚Äôs definitely a treat for my household to get it these days.. I prefer it hot cold I am not a fan of it but that‚Äôs a personal preference..

PEPI‚ÄôS SELL OUT PIZZA

If you‚Äôre looking for the old games don‚Äôt bother coming here. They replaced them with ‚Äúgambling for kids‚Äù type games and a vending machine of prizes. Always respected this place for keeping it old school but now I don‚Äôt even want to come. Pizza‚Äôs still good though.

Very friendly service the second we walked in the door. The young man, DeAndre, at the counter was immediately attentive to our presence. Our server, Amanda, was super sweet and took our order quickly and repeated it back to us to ensure accuracy. The overhead train in the dining area is a really cool entertaining touch too! Everyone was busy and had smiles as they worked. Food was pretty bland but filling. Will definitely return here again when in the area.

I grew up going to the original restaurant behind the building. I love that they got new games for the kids and added the gelato shop! I appreciate the old being incorporated into the new, every detail from the train running across the ceiling to the original tables with old sports clippings and the Pepsi cola light fixtures, up to the hole in the ceiling where they can toss the pizzas. Only problem is:
no one tossed the pizzas.
The open kitchen concept I would believe is for the customers to watch them toss the pizzas and unfortunately they did not. Kind of defeated the purpose of Pepi‚Äôs original love of pizza tossing. It‚Äôs a lost art. I would love to see that here again; it‚Äôs what made Pepi‚Äôs pizza so memorable for us kids in the old days. I do love the new building and all they have done to keep Pepi‚Äôs restaurant charm alive but that hand tossing would really be a wonderful thing to see again!

editorial_summary.overview: Casual pizza mainstay turning out custom & specialty pies along with subs, gelato & ice cream.

recentReviews.author: Carol Emmons
recentReviews.text: I am bias cuz I have had Pepi‚Äôs for about 40 years.. since o was a kid.. there pizza, fried dough, wings and even salad are great.. they have gone up in price so I can‚Äôt get it all the time but they do offer deals so it helps.. but it‚Äôs definitely a treat for my household to get it these days.. I prefer it hot cold I am not a fan of it but that‚Äôs a personal preference..

recentReviews.author: Jake Cosentino
recentReviews.text:
PEPI‚ÄôS SELL OUT PIZZA

If you‚Äôre looking for the old games don‚Äôt bother coming here. They replaced them with ‚Äúgambling for kids‚Äù type games and a vending machine of prizes. Always respected this place for keeping it old school but now I don‚Äôt even want to come. Pizza‚Äôs still good though.

recentReviews.author: Daniel Piper
recentReviews.text: Visited on 7/6/2025. Order #144. 1 large regular meaty special pizza for $32.25. Told server lightly brown soft crust. Not hard and crunchy. She asked about the slicing and I chose the standard 8 slice versus the square 16 sliced. Pizza came out 16 sliced and the crust edges and bottom were hard and crunchy. You couldn't even cut it with the knife they gave you. Horrible pizza. Had a similar issue 2 years ago also. Burned black crust. Wouldn't fix or do anything about it. Time before was in 2012 and back then their pizza was the best. Not now. I'll go elsewhere. Especially at that price.

recentReviews.author: Rachel Brophy
recentReviews.text:
I grew up going to the original restaurant behind the building. I love that they got new games for the kids and added the gelato shop! I appreciate the old being incorporated into the new, every detail from the train running across the ceiling to the original tables with old sports clippings and the Pepsi cola light fixtures, up to the hole in the ceiling where they can toss the pizzas. Only problem is:
no one tossed the pizzas.
The open kitchen concept I would believe is for the customers to watch them toss the pizzas and unfortunately they did not. Kind of defeated the purpose of Pepi‚Äôs original love of pizza tossing. It‚Äôs a lost art. I would love to see that here again; it‚Äôs what made Pepi‚Äôs pizza so memorable for us kids in the old days. I do love the new building and all they have done to keep Pepi‚Äôs restaurant charm alive but that hand tossing would really be a wonderful thing to see again!

recentReviews.author: Leslie Joscelyn
recentReviews.text: Very friendly service the second we walked in the door. The young man, DeAndre, at the counter was immediately attentive to our presence. Our server, Amanda, was super sweet and took our order quickly and repeated it back to us to ensure accuracy. The overhead train in the dining area is a really cool entertaining touch too! Everyone was busy and had smiles as they worked. Food was pretty bland but filling. Will definitely return here again when in the area.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.2/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the friendly and attentive service, specifically mentioning staff members by name, which enhances their dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The unique and entertaining overhead train feature in the dining area adds a memorable touch to the ambiance. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The integration of nostalgic elements, like original tables with old sports clippings and Pepsi cola light fixtures, resonates with long-time patrons and adds charm. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent pizza quality and past negative experiences - review management can address this concern
Loss of traditional ambiance and unique features (e.g., pizza tossing) - social media marketing can improve this area
Changes in entertainment offerings leading to customer dissatisfaction - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
